title: PHPob_clean()Function

metadata.description: Learn about PHPob_clean()Function with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Example
Delete some output before it can get sent to the browser:
<?php
ob_start();
echo "This output will not be sent to the 
  browser";
ob_clean();
echo "This output will be sent to the browser";
ob_end_flush();
?>

Definition and Usage
The
ob_clean()
function deletes all of the contents of the topmost output buffer, preventing
them from getting sent to the browser.
Syntax
ob_clean();
Technical Details
PHP Version:
4.2

★
+1

summary: This tutorial covers PHPob_clean()Function concepts and techniques.
